title: Stratified random sample of math or science majors

content.question: Which of the following sampling methods describes a stratified random sample?

choices.label: Select all female students on the list.
Randomly select 50 students on the list.
Randomize the names on the list and then select every tenth student on the randomized list.
Randomly select 25 names from the female students on the list and randomly select 25 names from the male students on the list.
Randomly select 50 students on the list who are attending college.

content.answer: Randomly select 25 names from the female students on the list and randomly select 25 names from the male students on the list.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Describe an appropriate method for gathering and representing data.
